mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND comic_id = #{comicId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND comic_id = #{comicId}
SELECT * FROM t_collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, u.nickname as authorName, cat.name as categoryName FROM t_collect col
INNER JOIN t_comic c ON col.comic_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_category cat ON c.category_id = cat.id WHERE col.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY col.create_time DESC
